remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是为设计器提供的托管的编译器和代码分析器。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. 可以在执行上下文和仅反射上下文中使用此方法。This method can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 在非托管元数据中的常数表用于存储的字段、 参数和属性的常数值。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常量的信息不会直接影响运行时行为。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 编译器检查此信息，在编译时，导入元数据时。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，则编译器将发出 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 流中嵌入的常量的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用于在运行时访问的常数表不 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 常量值的常数表的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA 第 II 文档。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该字段是静态的`obj`将被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` is ignored. 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 请注意的返回类型的`GetValue`是`Object`。Note that the return type of `GetValue` is `Object`. 例如，如果该字段将持有一个布尔值基元值，实例`Object`值将返回带有适当的布尔值。For example, if the field holds a Boolean primitive value, an instance of `Object` with the appropriate Boolean value is returned. 返回值之前`GetValue`检查以确定用户是否具有访问权限。Before returning the value, `GetValue` checks to see if the user has access permission. > [!NOTE] > 对于完全受信任的代码将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和通过反射调用，只要代码完全受信任。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，可以使用此方法访问非公共成员，如果授予调用方与标记线程和非公共成员的授予集限制到调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来检索静态字段的值。The following example uses the method to retrieve the value of a static field. 请注意，值`obj`自变量是`null`。Note that the value of the `obj` argument is `null`. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前字段在当前信任级别上是安全关键的还是安全可靠关键的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current field is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level.

value.span: 如果当前字段在当前信任级别上是安全关键的或安全可靠关键的，则为 ；如果它是透明的，则为 。

span.span: if the current field is security-critical or security-safe-critical at the current trust level; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性报告在其当前的信任级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的字段的透明度级别。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the field at its current trust level, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表中显示这些属性的组合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全级别Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |严重Critical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |可靠关键Safe critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用这些属性是比检查程序集及其类型和成员的安全批注、 检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types and members, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于部分信任程序集，此属性的值取决于当前的信任级别的程序集。For partial-trust assemblies, the value of this property depends on the current trust level of the assembly. 如果程序集加载到部分受信任的应用程序域 （例如，到沙盒应用程序域），运行时将忽略该程序集的安全批注。If the assembly is loaded into a partially trusted application domain (for example, into a sandboxed application domain), then the runtime ignores the security annotations of the assembly. 程序集及其所有类型被视为透明。The assembly and all its types are treated as transparent. 在运行时才会注意到部分信任程序集的安全批注时该程序集加载到完全受信任的应用程序域 （例如，为桌面应用程序的默认应用程序域）。The runtime pays attention to the security annotations of a partial-trust assembly only when that assembly is loaded into a fully trusted application domain (for example, into the default application domain of a desktop application). 与此相反，受信任的程序集 （即，具有强名称程序集安装在全局程序集缓存中） 是始终以而不考虑应用程序域的信任级别的完全信任方式加载的因此其当前的信任级别始终是完全受信任。By contrast, a trusted assembly (that is, a strong-named assembly that is installed in the global assembly cache) is always loaded with full trust regardless of the trust level of the application domain, so its current trust level is always fully trusted. 您可以使用来确定当前的信任级别的程序集和应用程序域和属性。You can determine the current trust levels of assemblies and application domains by using the and properties. 有关反射和透明度的详细信息，请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。For more information about reflection and transparency, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). 有关透明度的信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态字段时，该字段的一个副本由类型的所有实例共享。When a field is static, one copy of the field is shared by all instances of the type. `IsStatic`时设置属性`FieldAttributes.Static`属性设置。The `IsStatic` property is set when the `FieldAttributes.Static` attribute is set. 若要获取`IsStatic`属性，首先获取类`Type`。To get the `IsStatic` property, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`FieldInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `FieldInfo`. 从`FieldInfo`，获取`IsStatic`属性。From the `FieldInfo`, get the `IsStatic` property. 若要访问非公共字段，请设置`BindingFlags`到`NonPublic`中`GetField`方法并将可访问性设置为`Instance`或`Static`。To access a non-public field, set the `BindingFlags` to `NonPublic` in the `GetField` method and set the accessibility to `Instance` or `Static`. ## Examples 下面的示例确定指定的字段是否是静态的并显示结果。The following example determines whether the specified field is static and displays the result. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将分配`value`对象上的此实例反映的字段`obj`。This method will assign `value` to the field reflected by this instance on object `obj`. 如果该字段是静态的`obj`将被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新值将作为传递`Object`。The new value is passed as an `Object`. 例如，如果字段的类型为布尔值的实例`Object`值传递与相应的布尔值。For example, if the field's type is Boolean, an instance of `Object` with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 设置值前`SetValue`检查以确定用户是否具有访问权限。Before setting the value, `SetValue` checks to see if the user has access permission. 此最后一种方法是用于调用以下的便捷方法`SetValue`方法。This final method is a convenience method for calling the following `SetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 完全受信任的代码具有访问并调用私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性使用反射所需的权限。Fully trusted code has the permissions that are needed to access and invoke private constructors, methods, fields, and properties using reflection. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，可以使用此方法访问非公共成员，如果授予调用方与标记线程和非公共成员的授予集限制到调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例设置字段的值、 获取和显示的值，修改字段，并显示结果。The following example sets the value of a field, gets and displays the value, modifies the field, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/CPP/fieldinfo_setvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/CS/fieldinfo_setvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FieldInfo_SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FieldInfo_SetValue/VB/fieldinfo_setvalue.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将分配`value`的此实例反映的字段`obj`。This method will assign `value` to the field reflected by this instance on `obj`. 如果该字段是静态的`obj`将被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新值将作为传递`Object`。The new value is passed as an `Object`. 例如，如果该字段的类型为`Boolean`，实例`Object`值传递与相应的布尔值。For example, if the field's type is `Boolean`, an instance of `Object` with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 设置值前`SetValue`检查以确定用户是否具有访问权限。Before setting the value, `SetValue` checks to see if the user has access permission. > [!NOTE] > 完全受信任的代码具有访问并调用私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性使用反射所需的权限。Fully trusted code has the permissions that are needed to access and invoke private constructors, methods, fields, and properties using reflection. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，可以使用此方法访问非公共成员，如果授予调用方与标记线程和非公共成员的授予集限制到调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
